T02D3667:279a-1: shr'i ma h'a t'a r'a sto tra na ma /
T02D3667:279a-3: dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D3667:279a-4: dpal chen mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3667:279a-5: zhi ba'i grong khyer 'jug la grong sgo'i mi mo bzod byas 'dra ba dang //
T02D3667:279a-6: rgyal ba'i lam du 'jug la dbyibs can mdun na ngas pa'i gzhug lam lta bu dang //
T02D3667:279a-7: shin tu bzlog par dka'i ba'i bdud kyi rgyu las thar mdzad yang na gsang sngags lha //
T02D3667:279a-8: kho bo blo gros blon po 'dis ni dpal chen mo bstod bgyi ba ji lta lags //
T02D3667:279a-9: gang yang rgyal sras bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin sa bcu'i pha rol phyin rnams kyi //
T02D3667:279a-10: khyod kyi yon tan rin chen tshogs ni gsal mdzad lha rnams kyis kyang glu len te //
T02D3667:279a-11: de lta na yang gus pa 'ba' zhig gis bstod lha mo bdag la bzod mdzod kye //
T02D3667:279a-12: mi shes byis pa yis ni rang gi ma la thal gyis 'thor ba min nam ci //
T02D3667:279a-13: mtha' dag mi dbang 'dus pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rnams kyi btud byas 'dam skyes zhabs //
T02D3667:279a-14: gdugs dkar thig le gyen du 'bar zhing sa bdag khyed kyi 'dod pa yis ni 'gyur //
T02D3667:279a-15: rnam rgyas rdzing bur skyes pa'i 'od 'phrog spyan gyis gang la gzigs gyur de la ni //
T02D3667:279a-16: bcom ldan glang chen seng ge'i gdan rta shing rta rkang thang mchog rnams rjes su 'gro //
T02D3667:279a-17: rang gi phyag gi stobs kyis nyer skyes rnam grangs pha rol gnon pas dgra rnams thul //
T02D3667:279a-18: 'bar ba chen po dkyil 'khor mchog gi phun sum tshogs gyur mi bdag rnams la ni //
T02D3667:279a-19: ster bar bsngags shing nges 'byed sngags kyi yul la mi dbang blon po'i blor gyur la //
T02D3667:279a-20: ri skyibs zab mor sa phug zab mo'i gzhi la rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02D3667:279a-21: rab tu myos pa padma'i tshal la ma la yar rlung dal bus g-yo zhing bskyod //
T02D3667:279a-22: 'dab ma rnams la phul byung bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar glu len me tog gi //
T02D3667:279b-0: 'byung gnas ya mtshan mdzes ma khyod yin lha mo khyod kyi @279b bsngags pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D3667:279b-1: rgyal srid 'bras bu 'grub mdzad 'gram rgyas rtsi logs
T02D3667:279b-2: myos chu'i mtshan la 'gro / khyed zhabs bka' drin
T02D3667:279b-3: gyis ni rang dbang khang pa'i skyed mos tshal la
T02D3667:279b-4: yun ring du / rtsed mos spro la spyan mig drag tu g-yo zhig dga' mchog rnams kyis ni //
T02D3667:279b-5: zhal gyi padma'i dbugs rlung gis bskyod bud med rnams dang nye bar longs spyad nas //
T02D3667:279b-6: de ni aa mra sar pas bran las dri zhim sbrang rtsi rnams la 'thung bar 'gyur //
T02D3667:279b-7: rab dga'i nags la me tog khur 'phyang myos pa'i skad snyan khu byug gis khyab cing //
T02D3667:279b-8: sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bung ba tshogs pa'i dar dir ldan la so ga'i dpal yin te ;
T02D3667:279b-9: /'o ma'i rgya mtsho rlabs phreng g-yo bar bzhad gad ku mu da yi 'byung gnas dang //
T02D3667:279b-10: shel gyis gzhi bla ga ba med par phul byung zla ba'i che shad khyed nyid lags //
T02D3667:279b-11: bzo bos byas pa'i rtsed mo'i ri rtser bkod pa zla ba nor bu'i chu rgyun ni /
T02D3667:279b-12: bsrubs pa 'khrul 'khor chu srin kha nas 'thon cing rnyog bral lhung lhung sgrogs pa'i chu //
T02D3667:279b-13: dpyid dus chang gis myos zhing tshim pa'i khu byug skad snyan sgrogs pa'i nam mkha' la //
T02D3667:279b-14: sa skyong gis sprul khang pa dpe med pa la rab tu gnas mdzad khyed nyid lags //
T02D3667:279b-15: glang chen mche ba gnyen la bzo bos skar khur dra mig las 'thon bya 'dab la //
T02D3667:279b-16: gnas shing rnam par sgeg bcas myos pa'i phur ro na sgra snyan mgrin pa nas grag ste //
T02D3667:279b-17: nor bu'i rkang gdub mchog tu 'jam zhig sil khrol bskyod pa btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D3667:279b-18: sa skyong dag gi khyim la ti se'i gangs mtshungs phun sum tshogs pa khyed nyid las //
T02D3667:279b-19: nu mar nyer bzhag lag pa gcig gis smad gos gsher ba g-yo ba'i mtha' bzung ste //
T02D3667:279b-20: rkyal zhing rtse mo'i bde ba yun ring myos nas khang pa'i rdzing bu nas 'thon cing //
T02D3667:279b-21: skye bo 'dris pas skra rtse zlum shing cung zad zur mig lta ba tsha ba'i dus //
T02D3667:279b-22: ri mo bris 'dra'i yan lag mchog ma rnams dang nyams dga' khyed kyi mthu yis su //
T02D3667:279b-23: zla ba'i chos las brdungs shing 'khrul 'khor khang khyim rtse mo'i ri las bab //
T02D3667:279b-24: rab tu myos pa'i nags kyi nye logs padma'i ljon shing khang par sa bdag rnams //
T02D3667:279b-25: rgyun chad med par rlung yab dal bus g-yabs pa yis ni dbu skra g-yo zhing bskyod //
T02D3667:280a-0: nyi ma tsha ba'i dus la khyed kyi bka' drin las ni @280a * //
T02D3667:280a-2: chu 'bab sprin tshogs 'brug sgra sgrogs shig rma bya'i dkyil 'khor kun nas skad snyan 'don //
T02D3667:280a-3: 'dam skyes me thon la ni 'jam rlung rab tu g-yo shing glu dbyangs chu gter dus //
T02D3667:280a-4: snyan dngags mkhas pa'i dri zas bskor zhing 'jam pos bsnun pa'i gting ring rnga skad kyis /
T02D3667:280a-5: khang pa'i nad rnams yongs su gang ba khyed 'dod pas ni rgyun du thos par 'gyur //
T02D3667:280a-6: sbrang rtsi'i chang gis myos shing rig 'dzin grub pa'i chung ma'i chu skyes zhal la btud byas las //
T02D3667:280a-7: lhung ba'i mandha ra yi rdul gyi kun nas mdog ser ma par mtsho las rgyal //
T02D3667:280a-8: lha yi grong khyer gzhal med khang gi lha mo'i skye bo dam 'khyud spro ba la //
T02D3667:280a-9: khyed kyi mchog la sgrub pa po rnams bde nyid nyin rer rjes su myong bar 'gyur //
T02D3667:280a-10: sna tshogs 'gugs sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs sgrul rdo rje'i gur gyis me stag 'bar ba la //
T02D3667:280a-11: bgegs yi gtso bo rnams ni skrag cing 'jigs pas rgya mtsho dag tu 'bros 'gyur te //
T02D3667:280a-12: myur bar bskyod pa gtum po'i h'um yig sgra yis bsnun pas sgra ldan lcags srog gtor //
T02D3667:280a-13: lha mo khyed kyi gsang sngags zlos pa'i khang par rang nyid 'du zhing 'ong bar 'gyur //
T02D3667:280a-14: gar gnas khang sa'i skyor la glu dbyangs 'du sar rab brdungs gting ring rnga skad kyis //
T02D3667:280a-15: 'dris shing yid 'ong gling bu'i rjes 'gro'i sgra dbyangs nye bar longs spyod mdzad nas ni //
T02D3667:280a-16: de rjes gya tshom bung ba me tog snyim par gar gyi cho ga yid 'phrog la //
T02D3667:280a-17: rab tu myos ma rnams kyis khyed nyid gar gyi dpon por nges par gar gyi lha //
T02D3667:280a-18: rgyud chad med par lag pa'i rtsol ba'i bya bas bsnun pa'i yid 'ong rdza rnga'i bzhin //
T02D3667:280a-19: g-yer ka'i sgra yis myur bar rnam rol 'degs shing rma bya'i mjug sgro rna bar btsugs //
T02D3667:280a-20: rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas shing yid 'ong snod ldan skye bos yongs gang khang khyim la //
T02D3667:280a-21: khyed la brten pas bde ldan glu dbyangs bde ba nyid rer bde la longs spyod 'gyur ;
T02D3667:280a-22: / rgyal mtshan dang ni gdugs dkar seng ge'i gdan dang gser gyi bum pa rnga yab dang //
T02D3667:280a-23: zla zer dkar ba'i bsil khang mgyogs 'gro'i phreng ba dri zhim chang ldan glang chen rnams //
T02D3667:280a-24: khyed kyi gzugs brnyan rtag tu dran byed bud med de yi rna lung rin chen 'od //
T02D3667:280b-0: lha mo cung zad bzhad pa'i @280b rnam pas rnam par rgyal ba de ma thag tu 'gyur //
T02D3667:280b-1: skad snyan ngang pa'i dbyangs ni mchog tu 'gying 'gro nor bu'i rkang gdub sgra yis pham //
T02D3667:280b-2: 'gram logs dkyil 'khor 'jam rlung gis bdar g-yo zhing 'khyil pa'i sgra yis mdud pa 'byed //
T02D3667:280b-3: rked smad mdoms kyi cha ni 'od 'phro'i do shal nu ma'i khur bu'i ljid kyis dud //
T02D3667:280b-4: lha mos gnag la gzigs pa de la rnga yab dkar 'dzin bud med 'du bar 'gyur //
T02D3667:280b-5: rgyun mi 'chad par lha mo khyod kyi yon tan rjes dran mi skyo gang yin de //
T02D3667:280b-6: nor bu'i rang bzhin zhal ba'i gzhi mar zla zer lo 'dab rnams la 'gying ba yis //
T02D3667:280b-7: nu mar lag gcig nyer gzhag bud med skye bo dag gis bzung ba'i ga bur chu //
T02D3667:280b-8: kha 'bus autpal sngon mo dri ldan sbrang rtsi 'thungs 'gyur mi 'jigs sbyin pa kye //
T02D3667:280b-9: mo btsun rnams kyi 'gram pa'i logs pa rna rgyan mchog tu 'gying zhing rgod //
T02D3667:280b-10: spyan mig la yang khro ba soms bskyed pa'i mchi ma'i chu yis dba' rlabs g-yo //
T02D3667:280b-11: mkhregs shing 'bur ba nu ma so ma'i tshogs la gur gum 'dam gyis kha dog ser //
T02D3667:280b-12: rab rib sngon po dbu skra me tog kha 'bus tshogs pa 'ang mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur /
T02D3667:280b-13: sprul byas padma r'a ga'i stegs la 'gre ldog 'gyur ba lha mo'i skye bo las //
T02D3667:280b-14: sprul te gcal bkram mu tig do shal gyis khyab rin chen ljon shing khang pa'i nang //
T02D3667:280b-15: des lhung me tog rdul gyis kun nas yongs bsgos dga' ba'i sa yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D3667:280b-16: bcom ldan 'das ma khyed kyi zhabs zung mchod byed gang de yun ring gnas par 'gyur //
T02D3667:280b-17: skad cig re rer rnga ring rdza rnga mtha' dag brdungs pa'i sgra yis rkang pa 'gying //
T02D3667:280b-18: glang po mdzangs pa'i spyi la lag pa'i rna lcag
T02D3667:280b-19: rab 'god phyed btsugs mig / aa mra sar bran
T02D3667:280b-20: dri zhim 'bab cing 'gram pa'i dkyil 'khor dri ldan
T02D3667:280b-21: glang chen rnams // bcom ldan 'das ma mi gang yud tsam dran byed de la 'du bar 'gyur //
T02D3667:280b-22: spyi bo phug pas steng du 'bur te rna ba'i rnga yab dang ni lcags kyu g-yo //
T02D3667:280b-23: rkang pa srung byed rnams kyi rnam mang ca co'i bde bas chu thigs zer ma 'thor //
T02D3667:280b-24: rab tu rgol ba'i glang chen chang gis khong 'khrugs khyed mtshan grangs pa las //
T02D3667:280b-25: glang po mi rnams g-yul 'gyed pa na dgra bo'i sgrib pa rnams kyis sgrib par 'gyur //
T02D3667:281a-1: gyi rang bzhin ri yi skyibs dang lha yi skyed mos tshal gyi khang pa dang //
T02D3667:281a-2: mjug sgro rnam par rgyas pa'i rma bya rtsed mor gnas pa sa bdag khang pa dang //
T02D3667:281a-3: nam mkha' chu bo'i rlabs kyis byas pa dri med rin chen ljon shing khang pa dang //
T02D3667:281a-4: bud med skye bo'i zhal gyi padma'i 'byung gnas la yang gnas mdzad khyed nyid do //
T02D3667:281a-5: padma'i skyo ma sbrang rtsi'i khu ba'i chang gi btung bas sred cing bskor //
T02D3667:281a-6: sbrang bu'i tshogs pas dar dir mang ldan me tog tshogs pa'i dri zhim ldan //
T02D3667:281a-7: ngang pa'i rgyal po rab dga'i tshogs skyis zos te padma'i gzhon nus mche ba gtsigs //
T02D3667:281a-8: padma'i lha mo'i ze 'bru'i rdul gyi mdog ser rlabs ldan yun ring gnas par 'gyur //
T02D3667:281a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma rgyal ba dkon mchog cod pan spyi bor ldan padma'i rigs //
T02D3667:281a-10: khyod nyid kun don mdzad par lha rnams kyis kyang bstod de mang po smra mod kyi //
T02D3667:281a-11: de slad lha mo khyod kyis bstod pa 'di yis mchog tu dge ba bdag gis kyang ;
T02D3667:281a-12: / gang thob de yis 'gro ba khyad gsod dbul
T02D3667:281a-13: ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar shog / pandi ta chen
T02D3667:281a-14: po tsantra go mis mdzad pa'i dpal chen mo sgrol
T02D3667:281a-17: // / pandi ta chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal snga nas /
T02D3667:281a-18: lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan
T02D3667:281a-19: gyis lo ts'a ba blo gros rgyal pos bsgyur ba
